meanings.sent1: The dog felt overtreated with too many baths in one day.
meanings.sent2: The patient was overtreated with unnecessary medications.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked overtreated with too much frosting piled on top.
meanings.sent4: The garden appeared overtreated with an abundance of fertilizer.
meanings.sent5: The room felt overtreated with an overwhelming number of air fresheners.

meanings.definition: Subjected to too much medical care or intervention.
meanings.sent1: The overtreated patient had to visit the hospital multiple times in a week.
meanings.sent2: She felt overtreated with numerous tests and procedures.
meanings.sent3: The car seemed overtreated with frequent trips to the mechanic for minor issues.
meanings.sent4: The plant looked overtreated with excessive watering every day.
meanings.sent5: The child appeared overtreated with constant check-ups and appointments.
